price: Бас, агар юз ўгирсалар, сизнинг вазифангиз очиқ етказиб қўйиш, холос.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
